aka: Die letzten Nashörner: Eine neue Hoffnung
エクスプローラー：がんばれ！シロサイの赤ちゃん
this_title: The Last Rhinos: A New Hope
trans_title: Die letzten Nashörner: Eine neue Hoffnung
エクスプローラー：がんばれ！シロサイの赤ちゃん
introduction: Photographer Ami Vitale follows a global effort to save the northern white rhinoceros from extinction. With only two surviving females, a team of scientists races to create the world’s first surrogate rhino pregnancy. The fate of the species now rests in the hands of the teams who are devoted to saving it in this hopeful, urgent film.
foreign_title: The Last Rhinos: A New Hope
